Job Description:
Job Title: Data Analyst
Location: Hyderabad
Job Type: Full-time
Experience Required: Minimum 2 years
Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Data Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in SQL and advanced Excel, with at least 2 years of experience in data analysis. The role requires a person who can transform data into insights, support decision-making processes, and communicate findings effectively across various teams.
Key Responsibilities:

Analyze large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and insights.
Develop, maintain, and optimize SQL queries to extract data from databases.
Utilize advanced Excel functions (e.g., pivot tables, VLOOKUP, macros) to organize and analyze data.
Create clear and concise reports, dashboards, and visualizations to communicate key findings.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand data needs and provide data-driven recommendations.
Ensure data accuracy and integrity through regular audits and validation processes.
Support ad-hoc data requests and contribute to various data-related projects.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

SQL: Proficient in writing and optimizing SQL queries.
Advanced Excel: Strong experience with advanced Excel functionalities, including complex formulas, pivot tables, and macros.
Experience: Minimum of 2 years of hands-on experience in a data analyst role or similar position.
Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present data insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Attention to Detail: Strong analytical skills with a keen eye for detail and accuracy.
Problem-Solving: Ability to approach problems with a methodical and logical mindset.
Team Collaboration: Experience working in a collaborative environment and contributing to team goals.

What We Offer:

Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunities for professional development and growth.
Collaborative and inclusive work environment.

Job Type: Full-time
Pay: From ₹300,000.00 per year
Benefits:

Health insurance
Provident Fund

Schedule:

Day shift

Work Location: In person
